name: market for machine, for treatment of waste electric and electronic equipment | machine, for treatment of waste electric and electronic equipment | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9619/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'machine, for treatment of waste electric and electronic equipment', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a machine used for treatment of waste electric and electronic equipment. The infrastructure represent a mechanical treatment line for WEEE, comprising an initial shredder, a magnetic separator and an Eddy-current separator, a second (smaller) shredder, followed again by a magnetic separator and an Eddy-current separator, all linked by conveyor belts. The production line has a total mass of 35,000 kg. The process includes materials needed for the production, infrastructure and machineries used for the mechanical treatment of WEEE devices.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/429:Construction of other civil engineering projects/4290:Construction of other civil engineering projects
tags: Sector: Infrastructure & Machinery; Waste Treatment & Recycling
